DOC.brief_summary: To assess in moderate to severe Obstructive Sleep Apnea the effects of one year therapy with nighttime continuous positive airway pressure ventilation on the prevalence of metabolic syndrome and cardiovascular damage.
DOC.brief_title: Continuous Positive Airway Pressure in Sleep Apnea Syndrome: Effects on Metabolic Syndrome and Cardiac Damage
DOC.criteria: moderate to severe sleep apnea syndrome cardiovascular diseases (coronary artery disease, stroke, peripheral artery disease) thyroid diseases diabetes
